definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: All their costs, including study and living expenses, will be covered by the fund.
sentences.chinese: 包括通信費在內的大部分支出，都會由公司支付。

sentences.english: They also take into consideration the difficulty of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭的易度果豔也會斟酌在內。

sentences.english: In other words polarization properties are excluded.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，偏振性質未包括在內。

sentences.english: 20 the lampstands of pure gold with their lamps, to burn in front of the inner sanctuary as prescribed;
sentences.chinese: 並精金的燈臺和燈盞，可以照例點在內殿前。

sentences.english: Counseling or interjecting personal opinion is never permitted.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯過程中不許摻雜譯者的個人觀點在內。

sentences.english: There are six people in my family counting my grandfather and grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 我家裏連祖父母算在內有六口人。

sentences.english: With Meher Baba's great love in our hearts, external disasters can't harm us.
sentences.chinese: 有美赫巴巴之大戀愛藏在內心中，無外災可傷害。

sentences.english: I tend to extend the vernacular to include the owner of the software asset, such that
sentences.chinese: 我打算擴展包括軟件資源擁有者在內的這些概念。

sentences.english: Requests for essential supplies, including diagnostic reagents, are being met.
sentences.chinese: 正在滿足對包括診斷試劑在內的基本用品的要求。

sentences.english: Websites including Gawker have reported on the site.
sentences.chinese: 包括Gawker在內的多家網都對此進行了報道。

sentences.english: Do not violate third-party intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 請勿侵害包括版權，商標在內的第三方知識產權。

sentences.english: The dilemma is that not one single country within the EU is below the 3% limit, not even Germany.
sentences.chinese: 事實是包括德國在內，沒有一個國家刺字低於3%。

sentences.english: The men, who included four guards, were injured by rubber bullets and machetes.
sentences.chinese: 包括4名警衛在內的傷者因橡膠彈和大砍刀而受傷。

sentences.english: Sadly, video files are not on the list of accepted formats.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，視頻文件不包含在內。

sentences.english: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.chinese: 你必須將該處房產的資本增值考慮在內。

sentences.english: None of us, including the veteran comrades, is sufficiently capable of directing modern wars.
sentences.chinese: 指揮現代化戰爭，包括我們老同志在內，能力都不夠。
